essence.title: Our Essence
essence.description: What we believe, what we seek and the values that guide us every step.

Mission.title: Mission
Mission.description: Develop innovative technological solutions that address social and business challenges in Latin America, empowering communities and generating sustainable positive impact.

Vision.title: Vision
Vision.description: To be the leading reference in transformative technology in Latin America, recognized for excellence, empathy and commitment to a more connected and fair future.

contact_page_meta.title: Contact - Elipson Synergy
contact_page_meta.description: Get in touch with Elipson Synergy. We are ready to help you transform your ideas into digital reality.

contact_page_header.title: GET IN TOUCH WITH US
contact_page_header.description: We appreciate your message and are committed to providing you with the best attention. We will review your request and get back to you soon. We value your time and appreciate the opportunity to help you.

contact_validation_errors.name_invalid_chars: The name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
contact_validation_errors.name_required: The name must have at least 2 characters
contact_validation_errors.email_too_long: The email address is too long
contact_validation_errors.message_too_short: The message must have at least 10 characters.
contact_validation_errors.message_required: The message must have at least 10 characters

contact_modal_success.title: Message Sent!
contact_modal_success.message: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond as soon as possible.

contact_modal_error.title: Error
contact_modal_error.default_message: There was a problem sending your message. Please try again later.
contact_modal_error.timeout_message: The request took too long. Check your connection and try again.
contact_modal_error.network_message: Could not connect to the server. Check your internet connection.
contact_modal_error.server_error: Internal server error. Try again later.
contact_modal_error.invalid_data: The data sent is not valid. Check the form.

contact_messages_js.already_sending: A message is already being sent

products_cta_section.description: Every project starts with a conversation. Let's talk about how we can transform your vision into reality.

products_features_section.title: Technology that
products_features_section.description: Agile methodologies, cutting-edge technology stack and multidisciplinary teams to create solutions that make a difference.

agile_development.title: Agile Development
agile_development.description: Methodologies that guarantee fast deliveries and continuous adaptation to market needs.

premium_quality.title: Premium Quality
premium_quality.description: Enterprise quality standards with automated testing and long-term maintainable code.

continuous_innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
continuous_innovation.description: Constant research in new technologies to keep our projects at the forefront.

blog_page_meta.title: Blog - Elipson Synergy
blog_page_meta.description: Read our latest articles, news and updates on the Elipson Synergy blog.

blog_hero_section.subtitle: Knowledge, Innovation and Trends
blog_hero_section.description: Explore articles about technology, development, innovation and the latest trends in the digital world. We share our knowledge and experiences to drive community growth.

blog_coming_soon.title: Amazing Content on the Way
blog_coming_soon.description: We are preparing fascinating articles about development, technology, case studies and much more. In the meantime, we invite you to discover our projects.

tutorials.title: Technical Tutorials
tutorials.description: Step-by-step guides on the latest technologies and development best practices.

case_studies.title: Case Studies
case_studies.description: In-depth analysis of our projects and the challenges we have overcome.

industry_insights.title: Industry Insights
industry_insights.description: Trends, predictions and analysis of the current technology landscape.

blog_cta_section.title: Want to stay up to date?
blog_cta_section.description: Be the first to know about our new articles and updates. While we prepare our blog, you can explore our current projects.
blog_cta_section.notification: We'll notify you when we publish our first article

mateo_chilito.name: Mateo Chilito
mateo_chilito.description: Leads the global vision of Elipson Synergy, ensuring sustainable company growth and strategic alignment across all areas. His focus is centered on positive technological impact in Latin America and building a high-performance team.

laura_hurtado.name: Laura Hurtado
laura_hurtado.description: Responsible for building Elipson Synergy's brand identity and leading communication and expansion strategies in the Latin American market. She drives campaigns focused on emotional connection with users and promoting transformative solutions.

camilo_herrera.name: Camilo Herrera
camilo_herrera.description: Responsible for Elipson Synergy's technological architecture, leads the development of innovative digital solutions with a focus on scalability, security and efficiency. Supervises engineering teams to ensure solid and future-aligned products.

franklin_romero.name: Franklin Romero
franklin_romero.description: Manages the organization's financial health with strategic vision. Oversees budgets, investments and economic growth projections, ensuring the balance between innovation and financial sustainability.
